resources.string: You will see a screen with options as shown above. Each rectangle corresponds to one choice you can make. To learn more about the options, tap on the $ sign for the virtual money you may win (green) or lose (red). Tap on the dice for the probability of winning (green) or losing (red) this virtual money. You can tap on the symbols as much as you want. When you have decided, tap on the select button.
You\'ve finished the training! \n\nGood luck playing!

Something is wrong with storing your result, please try to exit the app by licking the square on the bottom and clear the app by swiping it to the left. If reopening the app does not solve the problem, please contact the technician.
The handshake message does not match!
The bluetooth is not responsive for over 500 milliseconds!
Bluetooth is not connected correctly, try again
